__e: He prefers that Tom stay with him until this thing blows over.
I'm afraid he'd prefer not to see you.
Um... if my moth.. ..if my mother calls for me again, could you please tell her that I don't want to see her for the time being?
We're still following up leads. There's not much else we can do.
Do me a favour and keep this between us.
The rest of you, remain alert.
I'd like to have them set in here. Give the men a little more space to breathe.
Maybe we should leave it here for the time being.
